reviews.review_msg: Excellent prof. Funny, personable and really knows her stuff. I absolutely recomend this class.
Great Prof...one of the best I have ever had...made the material incredibly interesting and allowed for great class discussions...cute too!

Nadine is very knowledgeable on certain topics - but ONLY those topics. Your papers should echo her discussions in class or else it's hard to get a good grade. She comes off condescending but I think she's just socially awkward (but still condescending and pretentious). Compared to profs like Torsten or Ramsey, she has a long way to go.

Nadine is an awsome prof.  Anyone who would criticize her experimental pedagogy, must simply not have understood it (although,I would have thought that grade-school crafts would have appealed to someone of such limited understanding)
